publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1555 Mr Stewart Maxwell: New York Introduces Self-Extinguishing Cigarettes-That the Parliament congratulates New York State on the ban of sales of non-self-extinguishing cigarettes within New York State; appreciates that this measure will help in saving the lives of some of the 900 Americans who die each year by fires started by cigarettes left unattended, and, given that smoking-related fires are the most common reason for preventable deaths reported by the Fire Service in Scotland and that under the Scotland Act 1998 this issue is reserved to Westminster, urges the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty's Government to introduce similar legislation in Scotland.
